name: The Sporecaller
visual: A cloaked figure kneels in a misty glade, whispering to glowing mushrooms. Spores drift upward like stars.
upright: Hidden potential, quiet influence, the beginning of unseen growth.
reversed: Stagnation, ignored intuition, overreliance on external signs.
uprightInterpretation: You enter quietly, but your influence will spread. You are a seed of unseen change.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel overlooked or uncertain—trust that your presence is already shaping the mycelial web.

name: The Rootwarden
visual: A gnarled hand emerges from the soil, grasping a twisted root. Vines coil around the wrist like bracelets.
upright: Stability, ancestral wisdom, grounding in tradition.
reversed: Entanglement, resistance to change, buried truths.
uprightInterpretation: You are called to anchor the Society. Your roots will stabilize others.
reversedInterpretation: You may resist the rituals or feel tangled in tradition—patience will reveal your place.

name: The Bloomwright
visual: A masked gardener stands in a greenhouse of impossible flowers—some blooming midair, others glowing faintly.
upright: Creative expression, peak vitality, the joy of cultivation.
uprightInterpretation: Your creativity will flourish here. You are invited to shape the aesthetic of the arcana.
reversedInterpretation: You may struggle to express yourself—let the greenhouse of the Society coax your bloom.

name: The Thornmage
visual: A figure in ceremonial robes holds a thorned staff. Behind them, a hedge maze pulses with red light.
uprightInterpretation: You are a protector of the sacred. Your boundaries will help others grow.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel defensive or wary—open slowly, like a rose with thorns.

name: The Dewseer
visual: A silver bowl catches morning dew beneath a fig tree. Reflections in the water show shifting visions.
uprightInterpretation: You perceive what others miss. Your insight will guide rituals and readings.
reversedInterpretation: You may misread signs or doubt your intuition—trust the mist, not the mirror.

name: The Custodian
visual: A moss-covered figure stands before a locked greenhouse door, holding a ring of rusted keys.
upright: Stewardship, legacy, guardianship of sacred knowledge.
reversed: Gatekeeping, fear of succession, hoarding wisdom.
uprightInterpretation: You are entrusted with lore. You will help preserve and pass on the mysteries.
reversedInterpretation: You may hoard knowledge or fear sharing—remember, moss grows best in community.

name: The Germinator
visual: A cracked seed glows in the palm of a hand. Tiny roots reach downward, a shoot curls upward.
reversed: False starts, hesitation, fear of growth.
uprightInterpretation: You are the beginning of something vital. Your ideas will sprout quickly.
reversedInterpretation: You may hesitate to commit—plant yourself fully and watch what grows.

name: The Mulchmother
visual: A robed figure scatters compost over a grave of wilted plants. Worms and fungi bloom in the soil.
upright: Transformation, nourishment through decay, cyclical wisdom.
reversed: Refusal to let go, stagnation, clinging to the past.
uprightInterpretation: You bring wisdom from endings. You will help others compost their past.
reversedInterpretation: You may cling to old roles—release what no longer serves and nourish the new.

name: The Canopy
visual: A vast overhead tangle of leaves and branches filters golden light. A hidden bird watches from above.
reversed: Obscured vision, overprotection, fear of exposure.
uprightInterpretation: You offer shelter and perspective. Others will gather beneath your shade.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel hidden or disconnected—step into the light and let your branches stretch.

name: The Greenbelt
visual: A winding path through dense foliage, marked with glowing glyphs and moss-covered stones.
reversed: Disorientation, lost purpose, straying from the path.
uprightInterpretation: You are a wanderer with purpose. The Society is your map and your mystery.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel lost or unsure—follow the moss, not the path.

name: The Pollinator
visual: A bee cloaked in ceremonial gold dust hovers over a blooming flower. Pollen trails sparkle in the air.
uprightInterpretation: You connect members and ideas. Your presence brings fruitful exchange.
reversedInterpretation: You may overextend or feel drained—pollinate with intention, not obligation.

name: The Terrarium
visual: A sealed glass vessel holds a miniature forest, glowing faintly with internal mist.
reversed: Confinement, artificiality, fear of the outside world.
uprightInterpretation: You thrive in contained rituals. You will create microcosms of magic.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel confined—break the glass when needed, and breathe the wild air.

name: The Pruner
visual: A masked figure with golden shears trims a dying branch. Petals fall like snow.
upright: Necessary endings, refinement, clarity through removal.
uprightInterpretation: You will help refine the Society. Your discernment is a gift.
reversedInterpretation: You may fear letting go—remember, pruning is an act of love.

name: The Humidity Keeper
visual: A robed figure fans mist over a bed of moss. Their breath forms glyphs in the air.
reversed: Overwatering, emotional overwhelm, lack of boundaries.
uprightInterpretation: You regulate the emotional climate. Your presence brings balance.
reversedInterpretation: You may absorb too much—release the mist, and let others carry the rain.

name: The Seedfather
visual: A cloaked elder plants a glowing seed beneath moonlight. Roots spread beneath their feet.
uprightInterpretation: You are a legacy bearer. Your joining echoes through generations.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel disconnected from the past—plant your own myth and let it root.

name: The Bloomveil
visual: A curtain of petals falls across a hidden doorway. Light flickers behind it.
upright: Revelation, beauty as threshold, mystery unfolding.
uprightInterpretation: You are drawn to mystery. Your curiosity will open hidden doors.
reversedInterpretation: You may be dazzled by illusion—seek the soil beneath the petals.

name: The Mycelium
visual: A network of glowing fungal threads spreads beneath the soil, connecting distant plants.
upright: Hidden support, underground wisdom, collective strength.
uprightInterpretation: You are already connected. Your joining activates unseen networks.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel isolated—reach out, the fungal threads are waiting.

name: The Rainbringer
visual: A figure dances in a storm, arms raised as lightning strikes a flowering tree.
uprightInterpretation: You bring emotional renewal. Your presence is a cleansing force.
reversedInterpretation: You may stir storms—learn to channel your downpour into growth.

name: The Solar Bloom
visual: A radiant flower opens toward the sun, petals shimmering like stained glass.
uprightInterpretation: You radiate joy. Your arrival energizes the Society.
reversedInterpretation: You may burn too brightly—pace your bloom, and protect your roots.

name: The Archive
visual: A moss-covered library with scrolls bound in bark and pressed leaves. A lantern glows green.
uprightInterpretation: You are a keeper of memory. Your contributions will be etched in moss.
reversedInterpretation: You may fear being forgotten—write your name in spores and stories.

name: The Grove
visual: A circle of ancient trees surrounds a pool of still water. Reflections show alternate realities.
uprightInterpretation: You complete a cycle. Your joining brings unity.
reversedInterpretation: You may feel fragmented—trust that the trees will welcome you.

name: The Wildling
visual: A barefoot figure runs through untamed undergrowth, trailing vines and laughter.
uprightInterpretation: You are untamed magic. Your energy will refresh the rituals.
reversedInterpretation: You may resist structure—find freedom within the form.
